lyrics.stanza: In the heart of Jesus There is love for you, Love most pure and tender, Love most deep and true; Why should you be lonely, Why for friendship sigh, When the heart of Jesus Has a full supply?
In the mind of Jesus There is thought for you, Warm as summer sunshine, Sweet as morning dew; Why should you be fearful, Why take anxious thought, Since the mind of Jesus Cares for those He bought?
In the field of Jesus There is work for you; Such as even angels Might rejoice to do; Why stand idly sighing For some life-work grand, While the field of Jesus Seeks your reaping hand?
In the Church of Jesus There's a place for you; Glorious, bright, and joyous, Right and peaceful too; Why then, like a wand'rer, Roam with weary pace, If the Church of Jesus Holds for you a place?
